product_details.description: ALDO womens Durable handbag This spaciously stylish tote bag boasts ample storage space and shoulder strap for extra utility Made of synthetic materials 1 compartment: stylish and functional to store your cell phone, wallet, or any other essential you need near by Medium: the perfect medium sized handbag for everyday life Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H (28cm x 10.5cm x 32cm) Fabric type - Faux Leather ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper ** Lining - Synthetic ** Country of Origin - Cambodia **

banner_details:
This stylish promotional banner is designed with a modern, minimalistic aesthetic, ideal for showcasing a fashion accessory. The background features smooth, flowing shapes in layered green tones, complemented by translucent circular overlays, creating a dynamic yet balanced layout. At the center is a high-quality image of a tote bag, framed effectively by the soft edges of the abstract background. Text layer **"heading"** highlights the theme in a futuristic font, while **"subheading"** provides product context. The bold **"price"** text and the contrasting **"cta"** text on a black rectangular **"cta_background"** button strongly enhance the call to action.

**Color Palette:**
- Forest Green (#28572a)
- Mint Green (#bde9c9)
- Emerald (#027223)
- White (#ffffff)
- Black (#000000)
- Tan/Brown (from product image)
product_color: The product image showcases a sophisticated tan brown handbag with elegant gold accents, making it a chic and versatile accessory. The primary color is a warm, muted tan (#B17A5E), which gives the bag a refined, neutral appeal suitable for varied settings. The gold hardware and decorative elements (#D4AF37) provide a luxurious contrast, standing out while seamlessly blending with the tan base due to their warm tone harmony. The subtle embossed texture adds depth to the surface. For an advertisement banner, a palette of tan (#B17A5E), gold (#D4AF37), soft cream (#F5F5DC), and dark brown (#4A3F35) would enhance elegance and focus attention on the product.
